description: Successful adverse possession - taxes not required in this jurisdiction
facts: Jack has occupied the wooded lot for 18 years
His possession has been continuous, open, and hostile
He never paid property taxes (not required here)
This jurisdiction does not require tax payment
asp_facts: claim(c9). claimant(c9, jack). property_type(c9, land). occupation_years(c9, 18). occupation_continuous(c9, yes). occupation_open(c9, yes). occupation_hostile(c9, yes). taxes_paid(c9, no). statutory_period(c9, 15). taxes_required(c9, no).
question: Has Jack acquired title through adverse possession?
rationale: In jurisdictions where tax payment is not required, adverse possession can succeed with just continuous, open, and hostile possession for the statutory period. Jack's 18 years exceeds the 15-year requirement.
